name: Coffee Break (itch) (GameDevR)
description:
You're a coffee barista and have to create multiple coffees in time (60 seconds)!

This game was made for the Mini Jam 87 (Theme: Break) (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-87-break).

Changelog Version 0.2 (2021-08-28)

Added Mouse Control support

Initial Version 0.1 (2021-08-22) Controls
  • WASD/Arrow Keys/Mouse - Navigation of the buttons
  • Space/Left Mouse Button - Hit/Action
  • H/Right Mouse Button - Show coffee types
  • M - Un-/Mute music
Tools
  • Engine: Godot (https://godotengine.org)
  • Art: Aseprite (https://www.aseprite.org)
  • Audio Editing: Audacity (https://www.audacityteam.org)
Credits
  • Sprites
    • Avatars (https://opengameart.org/content/minimalist-portrait-art)
  • Font
    • Monogram (https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram)
  • Music
    • Jazz Vibes #36 by Ellary (https://opengameart.org/content/jazzy-vibes-36-loop-smooth-jazz)
  • SFX
    • Button/Click sounds (https://opengameart.org/content/multiple-click-sounds-effects)
    • Coffee Machine (cut-down) (https://freesound.org/people/cabled_mess/sounds/394691/)
    • Success sound (https://freesound.org/people/Scrampunk/sounds/345299/)
